page.title: 19Children's leisure time.
page.content: On arriving home from school we have a drink and perhaps a snack. We attend to our pets and change. Many of us practice our Music before sitting down with our parents for a meal between 1800 and 1900. For our meal we have a traditional dinner with meat and vegetables or salad, and a dessert. During the evening we watch about four hours of television except when we go out to take part in an activity away from home. Girls go to Brownie or Guide meetings in the Village Hall or we may be taken to a neighbouring town for dancing, ballet, or music instrumental lessons. The boys have to go to nearby villages for Scouts or Cubs. We go swimming at the Sports Centre in Wycombe. We spend time reading before having a drink and going to bed about 2130.
